feed.title: Voltaserve Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Voltaserve: v3.1.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(misc): healthcheck in Docker Compose (#597) by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/598

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/compare/v3.1.2...v3.1.3

entry.title: New release for Voltaserve: v3.1.4

entry.title: New release for Voltaserve: v3.1.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ci(misc): specify working directory for go mod download by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/605
  • fix(idp): keep alive interval for Postgres by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/606

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/compare/v3.1.5...v3.1.6
